visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart titled 'Solar Employment Growth by Sector, 2010-2016'. The chart should have styled mode enabled, with a dark theme applied. The y-axis should be titled 'Number of Employees'. The legend should be vertically aligned to the middle and right-aligned. The chart should have five data series: 'Installation', 'Manufacturing', 'Sales & Distribution', 'Project Development', and 'Other'. Each series should start from the year 2010. The chart should also be responsive, with the legend layout changing to horizontal, center-aligned, and bottom-aligned when the chart width is 500px or less.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a dark theme, leveraging the 'dark-unica' CSS theme. The chart is titled 'Solar Employment Growth by Sector, 2010-2016' and includes a subtitle indicating the data source. The y-axis is labeled 'Number of Employees', and the legend is styled to be vertically aligned in the middle and right-aligned. The chart includes five data series, each starting from the year 2010, with series names and corresponding data points provided. The chart is also responsive, with the legend layout changing to horizontal, center-aligned, and bottom-aligned when the chart width is 500px or less. This configuration ensures that the chart is both visually appealing and functional across different screen sizes.
